name: Css3-responsive-image
tagline: Simple jQuery Plugin to generate responsive loaded Images based on CSS Media Queries
body: # CSS3 Responisve Image loading plugin Simple plugin for loading different sizes( or quality ) of a image depending on the screen size, by only using CSS3 media queries. The plugin has 4 predefined screen sizes inspired by Twitter Bootstrap See: http://getbootstrap.com/css/#responsive-utilities ## Demo & usage docs By default, the plugin adds a Dom Ready eventlistener and init's all elements with the 'data-toggle="responsive"' attribute. ### Markup Example Create a placeholder Image with the ``` ``` ### Markup Options |Attribute|Description| | ------- | -------- | |`data-aspect`|Image aspect ratio, is needed to keep the height of the image correct when resizing the screen.Predefined values: 1x1, 2x3, 3x2, 4x3, 16x9| |`data-xs`|Image path for Extra small devices eg. Phones (<768px)| |`data-sm`|Image path for Small devices eg. Tablets (≥768px)| |`data-md`|Image path for Medium devices eg. Desktops (≥992px)| |`data-lg`|Image path for Large devices eg. Desktops (≥1200px)|
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
